CustomField.formula: OR(IF(ISPICKVAL(Land_Area_Units__c, 'Acres'), OR(Land_Area__c > 5, ISBLANK(Land_Area__c)), FALSE), IF(ISPICKVAL(Land_Area_Units__c, 'Hectares'), OR(Land_Area__c > 2.02, ISBLANK(Land_Area__c)), FALSE), IF(ISPICKVAL(Land_Area_Units__c, 'Square Metres'), OR(Land_Area__c > 20234.3, ISBLANK(Land_Area__c)), FALSE))
CustomField.label: Land Area Warning Check
